author: IBM
name: DOcloud GreenTruck sample
description: A web application showing how to solve a simple transportation optimization problem. The application demonstrates how to integrate the IBM DOcloud Java client with data stored in MongoDB and a web frontend developed with AngularJS.

author: IBM
name: DOcloud Python client samples
description: These samples demonstrate how to use the Python Client to submit a problem to the IBM Decision Optimization on Cloud service.

author: IBM
name: DOcloud Call from Excel
description: Leverage the power of DOcloud directly from your Microsoft Excel workbook.
